column4: okay i'm trying to modifiy xorg as in this webpage is telling me to
and it mentions the lines Load drv and Load glx and make sure they aren't commented
but i dont see those lines at all
and it doesn't tell me where to put them
That will be in the "modules" section (and it is "dri" not "drv")
That is a line that you put in a text file
sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.list that is the file to put it in
what do i do with this? just paste in that line?
sudo apt-get update and the packages will be available
: do i need to save it some how first?
In nano press ctrl-X then Y then Enter
thanks for the all the help i can't belive i'm actually using linux :D
if i wanted to edit "/etc/ssh/sshd_config" would i use vi?
you need to use sudo make install, but I would prefer checkinstall
